mnemonic: A Nice Horse Yawns Happily At Sunrise, Every Year Often!
visual: Imagine a nice horse yawning happily at sunrise every year, greeting you with a friendly 'Hello!'
Imagine a truck so strong it can carry a tough rock.
Imagine an eel jumping into a cold kettle early in the morning.
Imagine a tiny person saying 'Wee!' as they jump onto a chair.
Imagine someone using chalk to sing a song while sitting at their desk.
Imagine someone trying to 'eat' their clothes and saying 'duh!' when they realize they’re supposed to wear them.
Imagine a child jumping in the air, landing on their knee.
Picture your teacher standing in the sun, singing a hymn to the class.
Imagine someone saying 'Ching!' as they wipe a surface, and then proudly declaring, 'So clean!'
Imagine a moose suddenly appearing up close to you, and you shout 'Dah!' because it’s scary.
Imagine students 'hacking' into a 'geo' (geography) test at school.
Imagine walking through a park and hearing a gong sound, then seeing someone wave a magic wand.
Picture an adult effortlessly 'running on air'.
Imagine someone getting a sudden 'jolt' while sitting, then saying 'duh' as they realize they were about to doze off.
Imagine a crowd of people shouting 'Man, tah!' as they point at a huge pile of something.
Imagine a group of people using hoes to dig up gold coins (salary) at their company picnic.
Imagine a notebook with a gong on the cover, and you write in it with chalk.
Picture your family cheering at a sports event, with one member dressed as a jock (athlete).
Imagine a group of young people watching a movie and shouting 'Wah!' at an exciting scene.
notes: This ties the sound to the experience of watching a movie!

visual: Imagine Jack (from 'Jack and the Beanstalk') pointing and saying, 'See! Ah! Dah!' as he starts climbing the beanstalk.
